topics.title: Week 1: JS Basics & ES6 Syntax
topics.details: let/const, Arrow Functions, Template Literals, Basic Arrays (.forEach, .push)

topics.title: Week 2: Functions & Scope
topics.details: Scope, Closures (basic), Arrow Functions vs Regular

topics.title: Week 3: Asynchronous JS - Promises
topics.details: Callbacks (concept), Promises (.then, .catch, .finally), fetch API

topics.title: Week 4: Asynchronous JS - async/await
topics.details: async/await syntax, Error Handling (try...catch)

topics.title: Key Array/Object Methods
topics.details: .map, .filter, .reduce, .find, Object Destructuring, Spread Operator (...)

topics.title: Modules
topics.details: import/export (ES Modules)

topics.title: Week 5: Intro to Node.js & NPM
topics.details: Node runtime, NPM init/install, package.json, basic terminal usage, CommonJS modules (require/module.exports)

topics.title: Week 6: Express.js Basics
topics.details: Setup server, Routing (GET, POST), Request (req) & Response (res) objects, Sending JSON

topics.title: Week 7: Express Middleware & REST
topics.details: Middleware concept & flow (next()), basic REST principles (HTTP Verbs), express.Router

topics.title: Week 8: MongoDB Atlas & Mongoose Setup
topics.details: NoSQL concepts, MongoDB Atlas setup, Connection String, Mongoose install & connect, Schema & Model definition

topics.title: Week 9: CRUD Operations with Mongoose
topics.details: Create, Read (find, findById), Update (findByIdAndUpdate), Delete (findByIdAndDelete) using Mongoose models in Express routes

topics.title: Week 10: Intro to React & JSX
topics.details: Vite setup, JSX syntax, Functional Components, Props

topics.title: Week 11: State & Events
topics.details: useState hook, Handling Events (onClick, onChange), Managing form input state

topics.title: Week 12: Conditional Rendering & Lists
topics.details: Conditional rendering (ternary, &&), Rendering lists with .map(), key prop importance

topics.title: Week 13: useEffect Hook
topics.details: Side effects, Fetching data on mount, Cleanup function basic, Handling CORS (backend)

topics.title: Week 14: React Router
topics.details: Client-side routing setup (react-router-dom v6+), Route, Link, useNavigate, useParams

topics.title: Week 15: Forms & Data Submission
topics.details: Controlled components, Handling form submission (onSubmit), Making POST requests to backend API

topics.title: Full Stack Connection
topics.details: Ensuring seamless data flow (React <-> Express), Debugging across stack

topics.title: Git & Version Control
topics.details: Essential Git commands (add, commit, push, pull, branch, merge), GitHub workflow

topics.title: Build Projects
topics.details: Apply knowledge by building ToDo List, Blog, etc.
